resources.string: ନିମ୍ନରେ ସେୟାର କରାଯାଇଥିବା ସମସ୍ତ ଫାଇଲ୍ ଇତିହାସ ଦିଆଯାଇଛି। ଆପଣ ଇତିହାସକୁ ଫିଲ୍ଟର କରିପାରିବେ।
ନମସ୍କାର! ଏହା ହେଉଛି ଆପଣଙ୍କର ଅନୁରୋଧ କରାଯାଇଥିବା ଫାଇଲ୍। CVOR ଦ୍ୱାରା ସୁରକ୍ଷିତ ଭାବେ ସେୟାର କରାଯାଇଛି!
ଫାଇଲ୍ ନାମ, ସେୟାର କରାଯାଇଥିବା ବ୍ୟକ୍ତି କିମ୍ବା ଲକ୍ଷ୍ୟ ଦ୍ୱାରା ଖୋଜନ୍ତୁ
CVOR ଦେଖନ୍ତୁ - ଆପଣଙ୍କର ଡାଟା ସେୟାର କରିବାର ଏକ ସ୍ମାର୍ଟ ଉପାୟ: https://www.google.com
ଆମକୁ ସାହାଯ୍ୟ କରନ୍ତୁ! CVOR କୁ ଆପଣଙ୍କର ସ୍ନେହୀମାନେ ଓ ପରିବାରକୁ ସୁପାରିଶ କରନ୍ତୁ ❤️
ଏହି ସୂଚନାକୁ ବ୍ୟବହାର କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଉପଯୋଗୀ ଅଧିକାର ଆବଶ୍ୟକ।

• Sharing With: Organisation/individual you are sharing the document with.
 • Purpose: Briefly add a purpose of the share.
 • Transparency: Adjust lightness of the smart text.
 • Font Size: Adjust size of smart text.
 • Grid style: Smart text repeats across the document. Uncheck to show once.
 • Position: Adjust the position of the smart text.
 • Smart text Preview: Shows a preview of the text to be applied to the file.
File could not be processed. Try compressing it to reduce size and try again.
Only files with less than 25 pages currently supported.
Long press to select multiple files.
Failed to process the selected file
Password protected files are not supported for favourites.
Failed to open document. It may be corrupted or unsupported.
Failed to rename file. Please try again.

An error occurred during watermarking. Try again.

• Smart share - Add smart text to images and PDFs when sharing your important files to prevent misuse.
 • Scan documents to PDF with enhanced preview and sharing options.
 • Compress, combine, split, and convert images to PDFs effortlessly.
 • Mark frequently used files as favourites for quick usage.
 • Keep track of your important shared files via the Smart share history.
 • Add smart text in your preferred language; 12 languages currently supported.
Expands and collapses the FAQ section
Have more questions or suggestions or want to report a bug?
Please describe your issue or suggestions here.
Unable to launch email app. You will have to launch it on your end and report.
Enjoying the app? Your review helps us improve! ❤️

All your files are processed and stored locally on your device. The only data that leaves the app is when you choose to share it via an external app. CVOR does not store, manage, or process any data remotely. If this changes in the future as part of a new feature, you will be informed accordingly.

Smart Share is designed to prevent misuse of your sensitive data. When a shared file contains the recipient’s identity, it acts as a psychological deterrent against misuse. Additionally, institutions may be reluctant to accept documents shared with someone else or used for a different purpose.
There are multiple situations where you may need to share sensitive data. Smart Share history helps you keep track of when and where you have shared your data.
How do I customize Smart Text?
Smart Text is optimized for speed and maintaining document integrity. Based on user feedback, we may introduce further customization options in future updates.
What is the maximum file size supported?

The app supports large files, but since the processing is done on the device, you may experience issues. For optimal performance, it is recommended to use files under 50MB. If dealing with multiple large files, consider processing them in smaller batches.
How do I select multiple files?
Long-press a file to enter multi-select mode.

PDF compression reduces file size, making it easier to share files with size restrictions. You can choose the compression level: High compression retains better quality with a smaller reduction in size, while Low compression significantly reduces file size but at the cost of quality.
Why is thumbnail quality low when reviewing files?
Thumbnails are intentionally compressed to provide fast previews. The original file remains unaffected and can be viewed in full quality in the Preview stage.
Why do some apps, like WhatsApp, show file previews differently?
Apps like WhatsApp may compress or resize files when generating previews, but the original file quality remains unchanged.
How can I change my language settings?
The app automatically uses your phone’s default language. To change the language, simply update your phone’s default language settings.
Why are some language translations incorrect or unclear?
While we strive to provide accurate translations, there can be instances where translations may be incorrect or unclear. Please message us and we will aim to fix it at the earliest.
By using this app, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
